content:
ICS 1C HW 2 for QQ Skeleton -- Heading

About QQ Skeleton

Name:Bita Boini
E-mail: easu1584@ea.oac.uci.edu
Major: Political Science

Three neat Web finds:

  1. Interesting find #1 is not due until next week.
  2. Neither is interesting find #2.
  3. Neither is interesting find #3.

Questions I can now answer
  1. Where is Hastings Law School?
  2. What is Julliard Music School's address?
  3. Who is the current leader of Iran?
  4. Where can I find a French speaking school?
  5. Where is the (LSAT) Law School Admissions Test being offered in October?
  1. Where is Hastings Law School?
    My answer is...I found out Hastings is a part of the University of California school systems.lawThis is a great opportunity to haveaccessto schools and major law firms on the World Wide Web.There are many law schools that have their own home page and with help from the different directories, you can find any school either in or outside of the United States.
  2. What is Julliard Music School's address?
    My answer is...I found out in addition to Julliard, other music schoolswhich might be of interest. There are search results which enable you to look at various music schools who are displaying enrollment information, and audition dates for scholarships.

    Return to list of questions.

  3. Who is the current leader of Iran?
    My answer is...Rafsangani,this is a wonderful program that lets you have direct language, movie, and recipe information about Iran, including any world news. The information available about Iran is very informative, at the same time you are reading Farsi and viewing a map of any city you want!

    Return to list of questions.

  4. Where can I find a French speaking school?
    My answer is...all over the United States and Europe, if you are interested in linguisticslook at all the different possibilities available to you. The University of Lausanne has plenty of information to mail to World Wide Web clients and would like to hear from you on their comment forms. This year their attendance rate has been the highest compared to other years

    Return to list of questions.

  5. Where is the (LSAT) Law School Admissions Test being offered in October?
    My answer is...Examsare available several times a year at various locations. Many schools want (LSAT) scores along with your area of interest submitted. Make sure to check the different areas of law you want information on and under each specified heading request forms are available to you.

    Return to list of questions.

Submitted February 08, 1995 for ICS 1C
